snippet: VW said that its global sales were 2.2 percent lower in November than a year earlier, with increases in Western European and Chinese deliveries helping to cushion the impact of steep drops elsewhere.
abstract: Volkswagen says its global sales fell 2.2 percent in November compared with November 2014.
lead_paragraph: VW said that its global sales were 2.2 percent lower in November than a year earlier, with increases in Western European and Chinese deliveries helping to cushion the impact of steep drops elsewhere.

headline.main: Volkswagen Reports Global Sales Down 2.2. Percent
headline.print_headline: Volkswagen Reports Global Sales Down 2.2. Percent
